At a conference for iOS developers WWDC-2019, we were able to meet with the AppStore team and convince them to reconsider their decision to remove the Suretly application from the AppStore. Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi, everybody!  SURcoin company is about to start buying SUR tokens.  With accordance to the White paper, SURcoin will buy SUR tokens quarterly for the sum of 0.2% of the crowdvouched loans issued.  In the 1st quarter of 2019, Suretly users vouched for 397 loans totaled at 1,535,253.97 rubles.  It is $23,471.24 at the current rate.  0.2% of this sum is $46.94.  SURcoin will buy tokens from April 5th to April 12th, based on the principle of the lowest price.  All tokens bought will be burned.  We want to remind you, that Suretly works in a pilot mode, which explains the low volume of loans issued. Despite this fact, we consider it very important to fulfill the obligations regarding the buying of tokens.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi everybody! Breaking news! 2 pieces of news, actually.  Recently we received a message from the App Store Review Team saying that our app was “removed from sale on the App Store at this time” ©  We cannot tell you how frustrated and outraged we were considering that the only reason named was that the Suretly app is “not appropriate for the App Store”.  We released the new Suretly app in August 2018. The old app has been available there since 2016 (!) But only recently it appears to be inappropriate. Really?!  But please, do not panic, everything is under control. At least we know the next steps we need to undertake to finally observe the Suretly app in the AppStore again.  We hope this story will have a happy ending, and in the meantime, we ask the Suretly community to support our crew.  There is another piece of news for you, guys, the good one. Actually, the great.  The SurCoin company has finished the implementation of SUR tokens and very soon, in March, token holders will get an opportunity to use them as a pledge for Suretly. The followers of our Telegram group @Suretly_official will get early access to the SurCoin platform in the next week.  It will only be for Android users for now, and we are sorry for that. As soon as we solve the problem with the App Store, the Apple devotees will get the same opportunities as Android users.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi! I guess you mean the part where we say that "we need to protect our business model from scammers and frauds (which is the major issue for cross-border lending and especially for p2p lending)"  The borrower will be from the same country as the lender, and before transferring the data on borrowers, the lender will verify the information. They will have all legally allowed sources for that, including the access to the credit bureau data. That is not possible to arrange when the borrower is in another jurisdiction. And that is the main problem of all p2p lending platforms which want to issue cross-boarding loans.  And this also will give us an opportunity to influence the credit history of the borrowers through the lenders' channel (to improve it or to make it worse in case of the default). That will also stimulate borrowers to pay the debt on time.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: The New Suretly App has been released! Hi, Suretly community! We are happy to inform you that yesterday, the brand-new Suretly app was successfully released. You can download it from the App Store and Google Play.  The first country where real loan orders will be available is Russia. We are waiting for the final adjustments from our partners to launch the full business model. We expect that real borrowers will show up in the app within the next month.  The demo mode of the Suretly app is available for any country. If your country is not supported yet, use this time to train with different strategies for vouching. When the full mode becomes available for your country, we will send you a notification, so you do not miss a moment to start gaining profit.  Overall, we plan to enter 5 countries this year.  The next development challenge for our team is the implementation of tokens. We will finish work on this in the next couple of months (but only for countries where the use of crypto is allowed).  This is a huge step toward our goals, and we want to thank you for being with the Suretly team during the time of development. Your support and your advice were the sources of our inspiration for all these months! We appreciate it a lot!  We will be happy to hear your feedback regarding the Suretly app!

Author: berlinboy
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Micro loans have become popular due to the simplicity of the clearance procedure and the short terms during which the submitted application is considered. The main difference between this service and ordinary credit is the amount that can be obtained.  Most microfinance organizations can provide no more than 50,000 rubles. Given that the credit limit is very limited, the maturity of the debt is also small and can range from a few weeks to several months. In some cases, when a loan is issued for a large amount, the maturity of the debt can be several years. That is, it becomes possible to choose the best option yourself.

Author: Todaytech
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Despite the fact that microfinance organizations in Russia have been functioning successfully for several years already, only three years ago such activities became absolutely legal - after the adoption of the appropriate legislative point, which determined that microcrediting is borrowing a loan for the amount of less than one million rubles provided by "In one hand."

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi!  In Suretly app customers can observe a list of borrowers who applied for short term loans. Profiles contain photo, city, age, gender and the statistical data on the timely loan repayment among borrowers of a similar category. Each customer can vouch for a borrower he likes and instantly get profit for each issued loan. After the loan is approved, the vouching sum get frozen in the amount according to the exchange rate and voucher receive the fee from the borrower. If the borrower won't pay off his loan later the voucher loses this sum.

Author: oficman
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: During economic and financial instability, microcredit in Ukraine has gained immense popularity among the population. This is due to the fact that large banking institutions do not want to deal with the issuance of small amounts for a short period of time (microcredits), since this is associated with high transaction costs. On the one hand, the decline in the standard of living dictates the need for money. On the other hand, the development of economic relations pushes the growth of demand for financial products.

Author: berlinboy
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Most often, when the bank is applying for a loan for a short period of time, the manager offers to issue a credit card. But on a credit card can be at times greater interest than on a regular loan, but for a long period of time.

Author: Todaytech
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: This situation is observed in many countries of the world. Otherwise, microcredit organizations would not have rushed to the rescue of the population. But now with the platform Suretly everything will be much easier and more profitable.

Author: Charisma359
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: In fact, like a loan in a bank, microfinance is the lease of cash, and you have to pay for any rent. But, unlike bank lending, here money is issued not by large private organizations, oriented to short terms, small amounts and high interest rates. Yes, the percentages are big. Since the risks of microfinance organizations are not insured in any way, they are all put into the interest rate, because the MFI risks much more than the bank. But the platform of this project will radically change the situation.

Author: Enchantment99
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: ADVANTAGES OF MICROCREDITION  The application for a microloan is considered very quickly. In most MFIs, especially those who issue loans online, this process takes no more than a day.  The money is sent to the customer's account immediately after the loan application is approved. No deposit is required.  Do not need official information about income.  You can apply for a microloan and receive money for a card through the Internet without visiting the MFI office.  Convenient ways of obtaining a loan: cash, a plastic card, a bank account, an electronic wallet.

Author: MoLoKo789
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: The fact that microfinance organizations have developed a flexible approach to the terms of granting a money loan can also be added to this list. The funds can be provided for a period of several days, to the nearest salary. This is much more convenient and profitable than making a loan in a bank for several months. Most financial institutions set a mandatory condition for a loan period of at least 3 months.

Body: Online review of the application for a loan is a certain risk for both the borrower (may refuse), and for the bank. Therefore, banks often tighten the terms for online loans: increase interest, reduce the maximum amount, reserve the right to change the terms of the contract. But this can be avoided when the project platform officially starts working.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Dear Suretly Community!  For the last couple of months, the Suretly team has faced a number of difficulties.  The difficulties arose in part because of changes in the Russian legal system. As Russia is the first country to experience the Suretly business model, these changes influenced the development process.  To be more concrete, in spring 2018 Russia tightened measures to help prevent obtaining money from criminal sources (according to the Federal Law №115). Due to the new rules, we had to make a number of changes in the app, as we collect and store some personal data and data regarding money transfers. We are still in the process of figuring out all the details.  At the same time, we have started to integrate with one of the biggest microfinance companies in Russia. During this process, we received several requests from our partner to make needed changes to the Suretly model. These changes included the extension of the loan term, for instance.  This was indeed a challenge for our team, but we were able to handle it!  Because of these difficulties, we had to increase the time of development and extend the deadline for the Suretly app release.   The release date was initially scheduled for the first half of 2018. Unfortunately, we cannot finish all work needed by the original due date.  We are working hard to meet the new projected release date for the app in August 2018. This is a year after the ICO.  Because of all the delays, we made the decision to freeze the token rewards that were promised to the Suretly crew for three months longer than originally planned.  We want to thank you for all your continuing support for Suretly. We ask you to please be patient and to give us your support for a little while longer.

Author: Artemsv
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Did You Earn, or Did You Learn?Summarizing Testing Bounty Campaign and The Contest    At 11:59 pm UTC on the 29th of April 2018, the Suretly Testing Bounty Campaign and Earn or Learn contest has concluded.  We want to thank all those brave and curious people who took part in this challenge! More than 130 people registered for the campaign, and that is a lot considering the relatively modest size of our community (due to the low emission of SUR tokens).  In this post, we will outline the issues we faced and the many possibilities we discovered during the Testing Campaign. You will also find out who gets the rewards after all!  https://blog.suretly.com/did-you-earn-or-did-you-learn-summarizing-testing-bounty-campaign-and-the-contest-8e4e9c3b028e

Author: Tonisim
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Where to invest $100 to get profit? Comparing crowdvouching and other alternatives in Russia https://blog.suretly.com/where-to-invest-100-to-get-profit-comparing-crowdvouching-and-other-alternatives-in-russia-1cc25038d244  At the core of crowdvouching is a very simple idea: you are getting value.  For the borrower (usually subprime), the value comes from getting both a lower interest rate and the opportunity finally to get fair loan conditions. They can make life better without finding themselves in a tight corner due to extortionate interest rates.  For the lender, the value comes from the possibility to issue many more loans and to eliminate default risks — therefore making business even more profitable.  And what about the voucher? That person takes a risk when covering the back of some stranger who lives, perhaps, a world away. Vouchers earn a profit, and the more risk you take, the more the profit may be.  Here in Suretly, we are endlessly inspired by the idea that there is no need for compromise. In this model, all sides win!  Today we will talk about vouchers, the crucial participants in the crowdvouching process. They put in their values (like fiat money or tokens) and take risks. However, is such an alternative really profitable?  Let’s compare how much a voucher can earn on crowdvouching with some other alternatives. We will start with Russia — as it seems pretty obvious that in different countries situations may differ.

Author: TOM47
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: 4 Reasons Why Suretly Leaves P2P Lending Behind https://blog.suretly.com/4-reasons-why-suretly-leaves-p2p-lending-behind-387af884c83d  People often make parallels between crowdvouching and P2P lending, or even mess them up. Especially since there are a lot of P2P companies conduct the ICO lately.  However, Suretly’s business model is significantly different from one they use for P2P lending platforms. In this article, we will tell you the four key reasons why crowdvouching is better than P2P lending.

Body: @Suretly,  when will we see the first results regarding the marketing and listing process? Author: LongHodler
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi Diana,  It looks like we will finally be able to see that the platform will be ready in the coming weeks if no additional delay occurs. Once the application hits the market, it is uttermost important for Suretly to be seen on social media wider, especially on Reddit and Telegram platforms. Note that Suretly is one of the few cryptocurrencies that do not have an official active Telegram channel.  Another important topic is that we need a well designed and localized website. We definitely need translations in Japan and Korean for investors plus the prioritized target countries on which Suretly will operate first.  Furthermore, a simple road map would be very useful at this moment to see and keep track of the progress. It does not need to be fully detailed. We just need some dates and the nature of the action. For example, coin burn, new exchange (see below), etc.  Last but not least, we need new market(s). For example, are you in contact with Binance?  Please let us know your opinions and thanks for your attention.  Edit: Reddit and Telegram.

Author: LongHodler
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi Diana,  I have invested in Suretly since the ICO and been closely watching this topic since the beginning. As almost all investors agree, the progress of the project development as well as the token price are far from being satisfactory. Perhaps there are too many things to be said in this context, but it does not help.  Obviously, your first priority should be to deliver a working product on time. I am sure you already know it and you should also know the reasons behind failure to publish the app on time. So please eliminate these problems and finish development of the platform as soon as possible.  I will talk about the other issues once we get rid of the biggest problem.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: We are disappointed with the token price as you are, and we cannot guarantee that it will get higher. It is legally forbidden. But we have a plan how to improve the situation to implement.  Tokens will be used in the application and this will form the demand for SURs. We will also buy SURs and burn them to decrease the number of tokens on market. Both will influence the price.  And one more thing. Most of tokens are raising because of hype without having a real product behind the project idea. Suretly is different as we are developing the real product for real people and not only for crypto enthusiasts. The plus is – our market already exists and it is much bigger than just cryptoworld.

Author: timmo18
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: I can honestly say I have lost all hope in this project and the team. I wish so much I could get my 20 Ether I invested back. I have learnt a lot more since I invested in this project and now I can understand more which tokens have value and which ones don't. They need to really try and come up with a plan for token holders. Just the release of there app and burning tokens in my opinion is going to do nothing. The fact the average user can use fiat and doesn't need to buy tokens just kills any use for the tokens. At least a user of the app needs to be able to purchase tokens within the app and get a bonus for doing so. For the business owner the idea is great and I think will do very well but for us investors I think we have massively lost out. I will hold my tokens regardless because I would never sell at this price. Would just be nice for a news update that benefits us token holders not just good news about the app and how it looks.

Suretly team invites you to test our app before anyone else does! There will only be 20 people who get exclusive access to the application in order to test its functionality and try the co-signing process for themselves.  If you want to be one of them, just send an e-mail to di (@) suretly.com with the text: I want to test the Suretly app. You will get access in a couple of weeks!

Author: Schreibi
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: The main problem with this project aren't the dev's, the idea or something like that.....the main problem is that we have super bad low volume sh** exchanges. HitBtc is a scam exchange....we all know. Etherdelta and this Waves DEX is total shit. I am an ICO investor and this is the main point i tried to bring to the devs at the near beginning.  This project could reach awesome hights with a good exchange for e. g. Bittrex. But nobody wants to sell or buy at those bad exchanges. We should at least have a bit more than ICO value but the devs dont care about getting listed on better exchanges before the app is ready. I totally understand the devs thoughts but the coin wont gain higher value when devs dont make efforts to get listed on better exchanges.  This is why we have 3USD value of a good project. The bounty hunter dumped their coins and there is nearly no demand on this exchanges. Thats all why the price is so low for the moment.  btw: Please tell Eugene that i received the shirt and i will post a photo!

Author: Nyk_1241
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi Devs, can you share in details what are your plans to provide utilisation and demand to the Sur Tokens.  The investors' have all lost significant amount of money investing in your project, and i think we all deserves answers on this.  We are all sick and tired of hearing you saying "you believe in this and that" and show us concrete research and analysis that support your claim. In managing the community, your team has consistently been very defensive on the suggestions and concerns from the ICO investors. This does not help to build my confidence in your team.  Understand there isn't any pressure for you to give a rats ass about our opinions as you were funded by BTCs and ETH which is at an all time high at the moment. But I don't think that is right.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hello, Schreibi! If it is reasonable, we are ready to consider listing on the new exchanges.  Be sure I will tell Eugene regarding the shirt.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hello, Nyk_1241! Sorry to hear you feel that we do not take into consideration our backers opinion.  That is our plan for SUR tokens, and I hope this will meet your expectations.  1.   After the SUR app is launched we will spread the information among crypto resources to attract interest to project.  2.   Approximately in 2 or 3 months after the product is released we plan to make tokens use available in the app.  3.   In parallel we will consider listing SUR tokens on other exchanges and if this is reasonable we will do that.  4.   As by agreement between Suretly, Inc and SURcoin pte.ltd, Suretly, Inc. will be transferring 0.2% of each loan secured by Suretly's investors to SURcoin pte.ltd as a license fee for using token in the App. It will begin doing this on a quarterly basis, after the 3rd quarter following the ICO is completed (in July 2018). This money will be used by SURcoin pte.ltd to buy tokens from exchanges. All purchased tokens will be burned. We plan to burn tokens with the only goal to influence the market price of it.

Author: timmo18
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: As much as I hate saying it I think we will never even get back to ICO price. From what I can see there hasn't really been any thought for the use of the token and to plan to integrate it within the app. I think the fact that they plan to buy back all tokens from exchanges and burn them kind of proves this. People who use the app will just crowdvouch in fiat. Why would anyone go through all the hassle to buy the tokens on an exchange and then send to the app, it would be pointless. My opinion the ICO was just an easy way to raise funds for the business as people who do not know much about ICO will invest because the business model looks good from the website but they don't understand there will be no demand for the token. And I think that is why they used an outside company to set up there ICO as they don't have any crypto knowledge. I think this is why they didn't raise nowhere near the funds they wanted during ICO because the ones who are more clued up could see the token had no future. I think the team should come up with a solid solution to involve the tokens more within the app so we can see a demand for the token and hopefully see some returns for investors. I mean without us investors they would not of had that large sum of money to help develop there business so it's only fair they find a solution so we also get rewarded.  My opinion is to be able to crowdvouch you should have to purchase tokens first and use only tokens to crowdvouch and fees paid by the borrower should be in tokens. Fiat should not be an option. The only fiat part of the business should be the loan that is issued from the lending companies. You should be able to purchase tokens from within the app to make it easy for consumers. Any business model that raised funds using ICO all make you buy there tokens to use there platform it's just how it works.  I have set up a telegram channel if anyone wants to join so we can maybe discuss some ideas because I think without some changes Suretly token will be dead. Hopefully we can discuss ideas with the team and find a solution. I do really like the Suretly platform and the idea we just need the tokens to be more involved.  Link for the telegram chat - https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAFCvrqKyxAIX61ilzQ

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hello Timmo!  Crowdvouching is a brand-new technology for the market. Our big goal for the next year – to enter markets of the US, Russia and Kazakhstan and gain a foothold there. Make it with fiat money is much easier. But this doesn’t mean we would not encourage the usage of tokens inside the app.  People from all over the world where this is legally allowed will eventually have an opportunity to vouch in Suretly app using tokens.  For example, are you from Russia, USA or Kazakhstan? If you are not, you will not be allowed to vouch for borrowers with fiat money. But you will have an opportunity to vouch with SUR tokens.   What we plan to create is a cross borders solution, which will allow people from everywhere to get profit from helping borrowers get loans.  PS Sorry for the late reply

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: I’m sorry you feel disappointed. This is a misunderstanding, and I hope we will clarify this issue.  In the White paper it was said: “There will be a possibility to use all issued SUR-tokens as a method of ensuring guarantee on a granted surety in the Suretly app.” The usage of fiat money was actually planned from the very beginning of the project, in the first version of Suretly app, which was tested with real people and real borrowers, fiat money was used.  We believe that users will prefer to use tokens. When we say about the USA, Russia and Kazakhstan, we mean that our partners will lend on that markets. But people from all over the world will have an opportunity to become a guarantor (if it is legally allowed in a specific country).  What we mean that there will be 200+ countries where people won’t be allowed to use fiat for vouching.  Regarding the USA – unfortunately it is not allowed to use tokens in that country yet. The Suretly team monitor the situation with ICO in this country every day and as soon as the situation changes we will add the function of use of tokens for the citizens of US.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: What we are planning to do is to make usage of tokens as convenient as it is possible.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Ok, we will try to

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Initially we will make the app available for those countries where we are launching – Russia, Kazakhstan, USA.  It is expected that a couple of months after the app is released tokens will be available in the app.  After we launch this function we will start promoting it among target audience from other countries. And will make the app available for other countries. The user who want to use token and doesn’t have it yet will have to go on exchange or get it other way. It will not be possible to purchase SUR in the app yet. This is possible in the future, but for now we do not plan that.  We plan to burn tokens with the only goal to influence the market price of it.   May I ask you a question, timmo18? Are you from Russia or Kazakhstan? I really doubt it, as we do not have a lot of backers from these countries. (We have a lot of backers from Europe, Indonesia, Japan…) And still you know about Suretly and own SUR tokens (do you?)  What we mean is that it is not necessary to live it these countries to know about Suretly, to have its coins and to use the app.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hello! All conditions regarding shares are contained in the White paper.  As we said in our blog, Suretly token is a utility token. That means that you can use it in the app instead of fiat money and get profit from sureties.  If we only use SURs, the app will be legally forbidden in a big number of countries. That would dramatically reduce the market for Suretly.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Fiat money in the App can be used ONLY in those countries where Suretly company is officially registered. These are Russia, Kazakhstan and USA. For all other world only SUR tokens can be used. We expect that it will be possible to use SURs in the App in a couple of months after running the App.  Let me know it the information is clear or you still have some question, guys. Thank you for being so involved!

Author: timmo18
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly

I never seen anything in the whitepaper about being able to use fiat within the app, the whole point of cryptocurrency is to not use fiat. Projects I have seen like Qvolta or Bitconnect you need to buy their tokens to use the platform. If you did not need to buy the tokens to use the platform there would be no use or value for the tokens.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Our project differs from those you mentioned. What is great about Suretly is that you will be able to vouch for the borrower from Russia being in India, or China or anywhere else. And only in some countries out of 200+ fiat money will be available for usage. But we still need that part of market to make the project more popular and get more partners from financial sphere.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Initially it was planned that fiat money would be used in the App, guys. And in the first version of app people used fiat money. The main reason is that borrowers are seeking for fiat money, not crypto currency or tokens.  USA is one of the biggest markets for Suretly – 40 billion dollars (!) . And sure we want to enter this market, although it is difficult.  We believe there will be enough people willing to use tokens instead of fiat money.  That is how we see it. After the product is released, the price may change significantly. After we start buy and burn, according to economic theory, the price should also change. These 2 facts will influence the token, what may result into the good ROI for our initial token holders. But it is legally forbidden for us to promise you that.  “But we will do our best to make our bakers happy” (and that is a quotation of our founder, guys)  We are also thinking over the benefits for those who will use tokens in the app. We cannot say specifically what will it be, yet. But making this decision we will consider all what our token holders proposed.

Author: timmo18
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: I can understand that the loan issuers are going to issue loans in fiat but why can't the crowdvouching part be tokens only? It seems like the use for the tokens hasn't really been thought through properly. The tokens need to play a big part within the app, the ICO was a massive part of your funding to get the Suretly business up and running and so they should play an active role within the app so at least investors have a chance of the tokens becoming more valuable. I can't see what other use the tokens could have because loan issuers would never issue a loan in tokens and you already said customers don't issue loans but they could be the only use for crowdvouching. So the funds invested from customers could be used to purchase tokens in the app and then used for crowdvouching. This was the general idea I always had.

Author: Nyk_1241
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: I agree with Timmo. The team has not placed the investors' interest in their priority.  When you mention in countries where only Suretly is registered, Fiat can be used. And these are USA and Russia, which are what you mentioned as the biggest market for crowdvouching, i do not see where else will any demand for this tokens. It now seems to me that the project team has only used the ICO investors as a convenient and gullible crowd to fund their project, without the need to give them any equities. And that after getting sufficient funds, they are now just burning us away.  In the whitepaper, it was said that crowd vouching is done through the use of SUR tokens. and now the Project team has conveniently brushed that aside. Simply using economic theory as a justification for raising token price is extremely unreliable, as i do not foresee any demand for the tokens.  Wonder what the project has to say about this. Disappointed with this team.

Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly

As Nyk said the method of simply burning the tokens is not going to increase the value as there is no use for them. Anyone could create an ERC20 token and burn the supply. I think most investors were under the impression only SUR tokens were going to be used for crowdvouching. There will be no marketing in any other countries for Suretly, no one will even no it exists. What do you mean when you say you believe there will be enough people willing to use tokens instead of fiat? Because unless you make it that the customers who are crowdvouching need to purchase tokens to be able to vouch then they would never choose that option over fiat. I can't see why there should be any legal issue to buy SUR tokens to use for crowdvouching. And if you believe there is then why advertise the way you did making everyone believe different. Could we please set up the telegram group chat to discuss the matters and it will also be good for the Suretly community as many ICO start-ups have these now.

Body: Hello, I was wondering if someone could help me as I am quite new to this. I was reading through the Suretly whitepaper and in the ICO section they have stated they are selling 15% of the company shares to SURcoin to raise between $1.5-10,000,0000 and they will issue tokens accordingly. And they also wrote all funds raised will be in exchange for 15% of Suretly Inc's shares. Does that mean all the token holders in total own a 15% share in the company? It is also stated during the first 3 years all profits will be re-invested in to the company's developments and after that Suretly is to pay dividends to SURcoin. So to those who are still holding tokens at that time will receive their portion of dividends? From the picture I could see on the whitepaper that was the impression I got. There was an arrow pointing from Suretly to SURcoin saying "divdends" then an arrow to investors with a "$" symbol. But then after that they say all dividends will be used by SURcoin to buy tokens from exchanges for burning. But if token holders do not want to sell on exchanges then surely they should receive dividends or am I incorrect? But I also seen a post on the Facebook page saying SUR tokens are what is needed to use on the app. So if tokens are being burned then what would be used? Sorry if I am being stupid I am just a very confused of the main purpose of the SUR token and where it will get it's value. My original understanding was token holders held a 15% share and as the company grew so would the value of the tokens. If anyone can help that would be great. Thanks

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hello! Token holders are not supposed to get dividends, because they are not shareholders. (Otherwise our token can be treated as a security, which is not, SUR token is a utility token). But of course SURcoin Pte.Ltd (the SPV company that conducted an ICO) owns 15% of Suretly, Inc. now. Shares were purchased for money raised via the ICO. So, it is very important to understand that SURs are not secured by shares or anything. SUR is only supposed to be used in the Suretly app as a method of ensuring guarantee on a granted surety. In the Suretly app fiat money will also be used. Actually, for the first months after launch in Russia. Kazakhstan and USA only fiat money will be allowed. Tokens will be used in the app only in those countries where it is legally allowed. This, as supposed, will happen in the 1st quarter of 2018. Also, as by agreement between Suretly, Inc and SURcoin pte.ltd, Suretly, Inc. will be transferring 0.2% of each loan secured by Suretly's investors to SURcoin pte.ltd as a license fee for using token in the App. It will begin doing this on a quarterly basis, after the 3rd quarter following the ICO is completed (in July 2018). This money will be used by SURcoin pte.ltd to buy tokens from exchanges. All purchased tokens will be burned. In case Suretly pays dividends to SURcoin pte.ltd they will also be used for “buy and burn” scheme. According to the economic theory, when the total supply is being reduced, the price should rise. But again, SUR is not a security, and we cannot promise you that.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hello RAGEmond! Thank you for the question. The App (in fact, 2 of them - iOs and Android) is a crowdvouching platform itself. But that is true, that the whole system is more than just an App. It includes  1. Mobile API (ensures the functioning of Suretly Apps for iOS and Android) 2. Lender API (connects the systems of microfinance partners with Suretly system) 3. SDK based on PHP, Go, Java (helps partners to integrate with Suretly within a few days) 4. Admin API and Admin Area (for Suretly administrators)  and more than that. Most of that is ready for today! Please, read more on our blog - https://goo.gl/7k4Zh3

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hello Schreibi! Thank you for your words, we are trying to give updates as soon as we have it. Usually, it happens at least once a week.  Regarding new exchanges, we made a lot of efforts previously, we have what we have for today, and now we are focused more on entering US market (what would be really great for Suretly and all token-holders) and developing an app.  Thank you for your advice on promoting Suretly, we will consider this. I personally think it makes sense. And we actually started this work by taking part in events all over the world and contacting to mass media.

Please invest a lot in marketing otherwise i cant see that this project will be sucessfull.  The idea behind suretly is awesome.  The project could have a huge ROI for all investors and i know Eugene wants to save money for penetrating new countries but marketing is important. Specially in US!!! So please, please, please make a good campaign.  Keep going with those blog updates. They help to understand what you are doing.  Thanks. Keep rocking guys.

Author: RAGEmond
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: What ever happened to those nice guys at Suretly?  Have you been thinking of that for the last 2 weeks? We have an answer!  We took some R&D time a month ago after ICO to make sure you, the people we work hard for, get the best Suretly has to offer.  It’s time for an update so you know we’re still on track. Here’s what’s been going on.  The dream becomes reality  You know Suretly released an alpha-version of the app for some countries. We wanted to get what we call ‘a minimum value product’ on the street quick for actionable feedback. This slightly less than prime time, but still great, version of Suretly app gave us great intelligence. We learned what works well, what’s really good, and what should be in the trash bin. The path has been filled with challenge, but the victories sweet. While we don’t want to share every tidbit of info in public, rest assured every lesson learned translates to huge wins for mobile developers regardless of skills and abilities.  Suretly App beta-version will be released in 1.5 month.  Solid design on a solid foundation  We called up some big-guns on UX/UI design and had a serious discussion about the struggles of making a truly user-friendly mobile-dev app. When the smoke cleared, we had in hand plans for several weeks of development and design. We are totally satisfied with the results of the meeting, and you will be too when you see how Suretly helps its users get profit from vouching, and smartly deploys for different countries and different languages.  Working our development team harder  We rode our development team hard this past month and they cranked out some great stuff. We pushed them for more core features including integration of iOs with backend, orders module for Android app, and lender API. There’s work to be done still, but the finish line is close. We’re on track for a superior beta-version release. We also made our team stronger by hiring a new member. Nikolay Dolgopolov is a skilled iOS developer with a background in creating a new social media for Europe.  Events of note  We were happy to be part of MFO Russia Summit 2017. This let us participate in the biggest microfinance event in the CIS Region. The event gave us the chance to find new partners we can rely on. We’ll be posting the results soon in our news feed so be sure to follow. We’re looking forward to the Benzinga Fin Tech Summit being held in San-Francisco on September 28th. Benzinga Fin Tech is going to be huge for Suretly ICO as this inspirational event establishes net trends in fintech.  That’s the news for today, we’ll keep you up to date as more follows. Be sure to follow Suretly news for all the related events.

Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi ) After ICO passed we have done a lot of things. The first project with creditor was finished. As we got feedback from it and from the first users of Suretly app, we know what exactly we shall improve. The strategy of entering new markets needs to be secure from the legal point of view, and our law team is working on it right now. A lot of negotiations are conducting to attract new reliable partners. This is one of the cornerstones of the Suretly strategy.

Author: suretly
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Only 10 days have passed since the ICO was over. We keep working hard on several things including software developing and  negotiations with exchanges. App is done and is available in several regions. We have complited a pilot project with a specific credit provider. According to the results we are making some changes in the app.  Listing on exchanges is not depend on us, but we will do all the best to be listed on large exchanges, but keep in mind that we should do it according to international laws.  Btw Tidex was the first exchange that listed Sur.

Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi!  ICO is over.  The last month was extremely difficult for us, but at the same time it was very interesting.  As you know, our ICO began with a massive DDOS attack, continued with the collapse of the crypto-currency market and ended 11 days after Bitcoin hardfork.  Despite everything, Suretly has raised a bit more than $2.8 million at the current rate (+ Bitcoin cash as addition to the raised amount).  It is almost 2 times more than a minimum target, and I'm sure it will be enough not only for a full  launch of the service in the three current countries, but will also for entering the Asian market in the third quarter of the next year.  At the moment, the Russian part of the Team is busy with updating the software and attracting new partners in Russia and Kazakhstan. An extensive marketing plan is also being prepared to attract more customers of the Suretly app.  The American part of the Team is working out legal issues related to the regulation of the microloans market, and is also preparing for a deal on the entry of SURCOIN PTE LTD into the shareholders of the main company. By the way, I want to emphasize once again that according to the ICO terms , SUR-tokens are not intended for any kind of use by US citizens / residents  So, we have a lot of work ahead and, of course, intend to become the next unicorn.   Many thanks to all who supported us all this time, thanks to all 1130 SUR-tokens holders and separately to those 275 people who believed in us at the preICO stage. I am sure that in the long run you will necessarily multiply your contribution.   Special thanks to those who took part in Bounty campaigns - without your support, probably, nothing would have happened at all.  And, of course, thanks to all Suretly Team and all those who somehow participated in the preparation for this ICO - and these are dozens of programmers, lawyers, journalists, PR specialists, copywriters, marketers.  The tokens withdrawal will be available soon. Here you can see the smart contract for ERC20-based tokens: https://github.com/SURETLY/token/blob/master/SuretlyContract.sol. Information about WAVES-based tokens will be available later.  The instructions for the withdrawal will be available as soon as tokens will be released. Please do not use exchange addresses for a withdrawal- use only the addresses which you have the private key from.  The list of exchanges where you can trade SUR tokens  will be announced later. Please keep in mind we need not only to negotiate with the exchanges, but also make sure for tokens not to be available for citizens of the US  and Singapore. It may take some time, but I hope the main issues will be resolved by the end of next week.

Author: carlow2

Author: iCoinSoftware
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Here is an extract from the White paper:  As by agreement between Suretly, Inc and SURcoin pte.ltd, Suretly, Inc. will be transferring 0.2% of each loan secured by Suretly's investors to SURcoin pte.ltd. It will begin doing this on a quarterly basis, after the 3rd quarter following the ICO is completed. This money will be used by SURcoin pte.ltd to buy tokens from exchanges. All purchased tokens will be burned.  The expected loans amount will depend on the number of lending partners and the active system users number, which, in turn, will depend on the amount of raised funds.  Page 16: https://suretly.com/docs/Suretly_whitepaper_v1.2.pdf

Author: iCoinSoftware
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi! Thank you for your question.  Those, who have participated in this ICO and have been following this project from the very beginning,  know that Suretly had been accelerated by Starta Accelerator in NY this winter.  Starta has invested in Suretly in February, 2017, 3 months before its ICO. Starta Accelerator is one of the investors of Suretly. Suretly has nothing to do with Starta's ICO. As well as Starta has nothing to do with Suretly's ICO.  In case with Starta all investors will have to wait for any portfolio company to make an exit to buy back its tokens.  In Suretly case it depends on a project itself. Yes, it is a real life project and team members will have to adopt to the openness of the crypto community. They will try to be open through social channels. As for a buy-&-burn process it will be done according to plan (you can read about it in the White Paper).

Author: seek4dream
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Yes, frequent communications between devs and community are important. Starta did a poor job in that aspect.

Author: iCoinSoftware
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Due to the SEC requirements Suretly won't be able to guarantee that SUR tokens will be listed on American exchanges. As you might know American exchanges take care about not listing certain type of tokens as well.

Author: iCoinSoftware
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Well, it is much easier to do that when you are an open-source company. There are always certain groups of followers who test and help your team with the development. It is a constant communication. With a real-life project it is more difficult but still possible, like, through blogs, news channels and some chats to give news, learn the feedback of the app usage and so on. But there is still a difference. Big companies like Tinkoff, for example, can have a lot of community managers hope Suretly will be like that in a year)))

Author: iCoinSoftware
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Yes, coins will be returned.  Quote from: p3ppymon on July 20, 2017, 05:35:16 PM Quote from: lidl on July 20, 2017, 02:32:41 PM Quote from: E_L on July 19, 2017, 04:30:49 PM So, guys, some news from a  previous weeks. The last 2 weeks were very difficult for us and,  unfortunately, our plans didn’t go as we wished and are not completely fullfilled. As you know, since the June, 10th we were in Hong Kong, where we negotiated about a possible launch of Suretly in China. Also, we presented the crowdvouching technology at the Rise-2017 conference - we received some positive feedback from the  market and we were invited to several business-accelerators in China. After the first day of the exhibition, we launched the ICO, and as you already know, we faced a powerful DDoS attack which led to inaccessibility of the service for more than 2.5 hours. We can’t blame the tech guys, even more than 10 servers couldn’t cope with the attack - it was VERY powerful. In addition to that, we  started our ICO in a bad-market-time, which caused refusals in investments from large players, who previously planned to invest a fairly large amount. Of course, both of these facts negatively affected to the dynamic, which in turn lowered the expectations of speculative investors, as a result of which we raised  only a minimum target in the first few days. Anyway, I would like to emphasise that even a minimum of 1.5M will allow us to fully develop our business in Russia and Kazakhstan. We will launch our application in the pilot-mode in the US this year. Let me remind you that the US is a huge market for us, its size is about 40 billion dollars. So, we are ready to work in "agile" mode with the minimum funding. We are the "lean startup" and we know how to use money more effective If we collect a large amount (or the ETH/USD will continue to grow) - we will be able to scale our business more faster and we will  open Europe and Asia branches next year.  Thank you for such a report! Not every project has such a feedback!  The regular released news from Decs really help the community! Well done.  Just to prevent any critic, can you reference with names, websites or other sources the players willing or already participating in the project?  The team is already in the White Paper.

Author: E_L
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: So, guys, some news from a  previous weeks.  The last 2 weeks were very difficult for us and,  unfortunately, our plans didn’t go as we wished and are not completely fullfilled.  As you know, since the June, 10th we were in Hong Kong, where we negotiated about a possible launch of Suretly in China.  Also, we presented the crowdvouching technology at the Rise-2017 conference - we received some positive feedback from the  market and we were invited to several business-accelerators in China.  After the first day of the exhibition, we launched the ICO, and as you already know, we faced a powerful DDoS attack which led to inaccessibility of the service for more than 2.5 hours. We can’t blame the tech guys, even more than 10 servers couldn’t cope with the attack - it was VERY powerful.  In addition to that, we  started our ICO in a bad-market-time, which caused refusals in investments from large players, who previously planned to invest a fairly large amount.  Of course, both of these facts negatively affected to the dynamic, which in turn lowered the expectations of speculative investors, as a result of which we raised  only a minimum target in the first few days.  Anyway, I would like to emphasise that even a minimum of 1.5M will allow us to fully develop our business in Russia and Kazakhstan. We will launch our application in the pilot-mode in the US this year. Let me remind you that the US is a huge market for us, its size is about 40 billion dollars.  So, we are ready to work in "agile" mode with the minimum funding. We are the "lean startup" and we know how to use money more effective  If we collect a large amount (or the ETH/USD will continue to grow) - we will be able to scale our business more faster and we will  open Europe and Asia branches next year.

Author: iCoinSoftware
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Suretly participated in acceleration program in Starta this winter. suretly has nothing to do with Starta ICO, they raised money for refinance purposes. Suretly and other projects are in Starta portfolio because usually when a project is accelerated by such organization he gets investments that consist of mentoring, demo day , some cash and other stuff. In return Accelerator gets shares in every project. Suretly is in the portfolio, but wont get any money Starta raised because Starta is slready its investor.

Body: What is fair?  Quote from: kaltun on July 10, 2017, 12:04:39 PM Quote from: anhbloginc on July 10, 2017, 11:57:44 AM Quote from: kaltun on July 10, 2017, 11:54:57 AM Quote from: anhbloginc on July 10, 2017, 11:48:37 AM Does anyone worry about the presale Sur?  It seems who have purchased presale will have a very competitive based price. A lot of people have purchased with 200% bonus (1ETH = 20 PreSur, 1 PreSur = 2 Sur, then 1ETH = 40 Sur), while purchasing publich ICO in the first hour will get 17 Sur per each ETH.  So, it means based price for people who purchased PreSur will be 0.0025 / 1 Sur. Meanwhile, the based price for public ICO will be 0.0058 / 1 Sur.  > 100%, right?  thats why it was PreIco. if you miss it then pity, go for round 2( thus first hour)  and if you miss that , you can  go to round 3 (after first hour) ect ect  Bonuses: First hour: 70% First day (after first hour) : 50% Second day: 40% 3th day: 30% 4th day: 20% 5th day: 10%   I know what is preICO or presale. However, but a huge discount like that, people who hold Sur tokens with a good based price will dump the market . That's what I'm worrying  first off all, they sold for a $ 350K coins , this because to start their idea ... alot of people didnt trust it ( you know , newbie account , no escrow ..) and people who did gamble this is their price .....  and what about the bounty hunters , they get their coins for free much worser   Oh, please, read about the bounty hunters who aimed to get tokens by completing a part of bounty program in "Media and Articles". Body: Any ICO is about fundraising, please, learn the statistic. It will be  the only one of my personal point, but please do learn the statistics and try to notice the constant participants during any ICOs or even venture capitals.  Yes, it will be used as a mean of a guarantee of a loan. Plus, it will be used as buy back-burn tokens. Suretly has stated they would buy back SUR-tokens every quarter (every 3 months).  Quote from: Reaper3 on July 10, 2017, 11:39:09 AM The first hour bonus is very interesting, but even if you miss that the 1st day bonus is attractive as well.  +  Quote from: Dvd1989 on July 10, 2017, 11:43:21 AM Quote from: frabe on July 10, 2017, 10:28:59 AM I would like to invest but the Suretly App cannot be downloaded from Thailand  I like your project and the idea about crowdvouching very much and would like to invest 20 Ether.  But the App cannot be downloaded and used in Thailand (see screenshot).  Without the App I cannot take part on the crowdvouching which is the main reason I would like to invest in your project.    Why wouldn't you be able to join the ICO without an app?  As the WP stated more then trillion of dollars is the global market. That's why people want to know more and try the app. We can't judge them for that.  Quote from: anhbloginc on July 10, 2017, 11:57:44 AM Quote from: kaltun on July 10, 2017, 11:54:57 AM Quote from: anhbloginc on July 10, 2017, 11:48:37 AM Does anyone worry about the presale Sur?  It seems who have purchased presale will have a very competitive based price. A lot of people have purchased with 200% bonus (1ETH = 20 PreSur, 1 PreSur = 2 Sur, then 1ETH = 40 Sur), while purchasing publich ICO in the first hour will get 17 Sur per each ETH.  So, it means based price for people who purchased PreSur will be 0.0025 / 1 Sur. Meanwhile, the based price for public ICO will be 0.0058 / 1 Sur.  > 100%, right?  thats why it was PreIco. if you miss it then pity, go for round 2( thus first hour)  and if you miss that , you can  go to round 3 (after first hour) ect ect  Bonuses: First hour: 70% First day (after first hour) : 50% Second day: 40% 3th day: 30% 4th day: 20% 5th day: 10%   I know what is preICO or presale. However, but a huge discount like that, people who hold Sur tokens with a good based price will dump the market . That's what I'm worrying  Well, you have all rights to worry about it. What will become when the second of buy-back_&_burn would be over?

Body: The update will be on Saturday as usually.  Quote from: HomoHenning on July 06, 2017, 10:00:47 PM Quote from: Reaper3 on July 06, 2017, 12:46:24 PM Quote from: iCoinSoftware on July 06, 2017, 10:03:35 AM Quote from: seek4dream on July 06, 2017, 09:33:15 AM Quote from: iCoinSoftware on July 06, 2017, 09:20:09 AM We have updated the White paper, here are some changes:  - A brief information about the markets of micro-loans in the US and Russia was added; - You can a sketchy roadmap; - A new section was added «Are vouchers interested?»; - You can read details how the buy-burn process will work (there won’t be any dividends paid to investors- Suretly will buyback SUR-tokens on exchanges and burn them, the amount of SUR-tokens won’t decrease and it will be almost the same as a dividend payout); - A new member of a core team was added (Regional Director for work with CIS and Russia).  Here is the link to the White paper: https://suretly.com/docs/Suretly_whitepaper_v1.2.pdf    Thanks for the update. Everything goes well. I just wish there will be more videos in YouTube.  Today there will be a live stream on Youtube. Eugene Lobachev, CEO and Founder Suretly will answer on the most exciting and harsh questions from Addy Crezee.     This is one to watch. Good that there is more media attention   For everybody who missed it:  The interview with Suretly CEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_zGmEthNcac  And maybe he should start learning english as a blockchain tech CEO...  Oh, he knows English alright))) He decided not to scare people away with his Siberian accent

Author: iCoinSoftware
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: 1. General lenders lend money after a borrower is checked and had a loan scoring process. There are credit reporting agencies almost in all countries, financial institutions  usually check with a credit reference bureau a credit history of this or that person who asks for a loan or credit. Every and each borrower will be checked and a loan scoring procedure will be undertaken under him. Of course, there will be a lot of people from a higher risk group and that will be indicated in his/her profile in Suretly's application. It’s up to you whom to choose - low income with low risk or high income with high risk. You can always choose profiles with the minimum risk rate. It will depend on every voucher strategy.   2.  First of all, guarantors don’t share an interest rate with lender. The borrower should pay to guarantors separately and the cost of voucher’s service will be between 5% (for low-risk borrowers) to 20% (for-very-high risk borrowers) from a loan amount. Also, vouchers get their profit in the moment of a loan issuing, not at the end of a loan-period term. Every voucher can be responsible only for $10 dollars per each loan.   3. Of course, there are lot of such organizations which lend money for such short-term period. Microcredits is a huge market.  In the USA, for example, a half of an adult population is "underserved", that means  they are not able to have a loan from classic lenders (such as banks). According to CSFI (Center for Financial Services innovation), such people spent up to $40 billion annually  on fees and interest for such type of loans only in the US.

Author: nasasan620
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi, this scheme is quite interesting.  However, there are few points that I am worried or somewhat skeptical in this scheme,  1. If general lenders are all guaranteed with what they lend without risking their own money, would they just lend as much as they want so that they can maximize their returns because there is no fear in loosing their own money?  2.  Guarantors only get a few percent of what they put in collateral for borrowers.  So, if even a few of the borrowers they guaranteed get default, their net profits are easily gone because the net profit from other is larger than what they put in collateral for one person?  Does that means there is less incentive to join for guarantors?  3.  You have stated there is only a micro-loan around 1000USD for max. with short term to be provided as a loan.  Why there is such a small limit?  If there is one who cannot even borrow such a small amount from legit institutions in real life, I wonder he or she might be the one who is the least credit and likely get into default. Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly

Here is the link to the White paper: https://suretly.com/docs/Suretly_whitepaper_v1.2.pdf

Author: E_L
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi,  I am on m way to Money 20/20.  I lost track of time and didn’t write you what was going on with Suretly for several weeks. I am really sorry I’ve been very busy during these weeks.  1) I went to the Startup Village and met with a lot of investors there.  2) I began a recruiting process and interviewed a lot of people for several roles: CEO for Russian and CIS office, IOS Developer, Back-end Developer, PR and Marketing. I’ve hired a new CEO for CIS region. We keep on searching the best from the best.  3) It took me a lot of time to clarify a lot of things with lawyers. It turned out to be a difficult case to consider a lot of issues in Singapore.  4) We worked on the updated Whitepaper. It is coming soon.  5) We went to Blockchain & Bitcoin Conference in St. Petersburg. I think you all remember that we had a contest and met the winners of it there. We met a lot of cryptofriends, too. There was Suretly’s stand in the demo space and we tried to pitch to every person we could there.  6) We’ve started Suretly’s PR campaign. We reached out to main Media resources, we will start targeting advertisement and other stuff.

Author: iCoinSoftware
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi everyone!  Now it is official!  Today we have launched a brandnew type of ICO - Initial Chocolate Offering!  Suretly will launch Initial Chocolate Offering.  NYC-based startup Suretly, which raised $350K during preICO round this May, will launch an Initial Chocolate Offering. The event will take place in Copenhagen, Denmark during Money2020 conference. All guests who will visit Suretly's booth will be gifted with a chocolate souvenirs shaped in SUR-token. Each token will be packed in the individual memorable wrapping with the future Suretly ICO information.  We decided to bring a new meaning into the popular term of ICO and give an opportunity to feel a real taste of a true ICO campaign, - said Eugene Lobachev, Suretly founder, - Our choco-token are made of delicious alpine chocolate and all cryptoinvestors will like the taste of it.   Souvenirs have a limited edition of 3000 pieces and it will be given away at the Suretly's booth in Startup City on June 26,27,28 during Money 20/20 conference.  https://twitter.com/suretly_com/status/879274095468269573

Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: So Suretly, I've been thinking more about the lenders and how you are having to partner with banks or otherwise to lend to vouched borrowers.  Have you thought about finding lenders of BTC or other cryptos or is your model to find fiat lenders only?  This has not been discussed much so your feedback would be welcomed. Thanks

Author: iCoinSoftware
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: We remember everything and will fix it!  Quote from: Breasal on June 01, 2017, 02:44:55 PM So Suretly, I've been thinking more about the lenders and how you are having to partner with banks or otherwise to lend to vouched borrowers.  Have you thought about finding lenders of BTC or other cryptos or is your model to find fiat lenders only?  This has not been discussed much so your feedback would be welcomed. Thanks   Well, that's a good idea for the future. Right now Suretly is mainly focused on fiat lenders because it is a huge market. Loans are given for a short period and credit rates are high enough which is good for the profit and investors. Of course, crowdvouching can be used for any kinds of lendings.

Author: Breasal
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: It's possible that Suretly and crowd-vouching will become the uber of lending

Author: E_L
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Week summary:  1. We had a meeting with Sasha Ivanov, CEO of Waves platform. He likes the crowdvouching idea and probably we'll have some kind of cooperation. 2. I participated in St.Petersburg International Economic Forum and met a lot of potential investors, who is willing to participate in the ICO. 3. We've finished a legal research about ICO and our company in SG is almost ready. 4. We've reached some agreements on PR activities. 5. Our advisory board is almost built . 6. We have hired a Recruiting-agency to hire more people. 7. The date of the ICO will be announced today. 8. Media & Articles Campaign will be announced next week.

Author: E_L
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: So, the news of last week.  1. We participated in  Consensus' 2017. I met a large number of people from the crypto community and I told a lot about Suretly to the "giants" of the cryptoindustry. 2. I made a minute pitch on SVOD '2017 (SVOD - Silicon Valley Open Doors, annual startup event ). 3. I met with ex-CEO vouch.com, which Suretly is constantly compared with (although our business models are completely different and the company was closed due to lack of investments). He said that he would like to become one of our investors. 4. I met with representatives of Hong Kong Economic and Trade office in San Francisco. They are interested in our technology and they are ready to help us with the launch in Asia 5. We held several meetings with venture funds from Silicon Valley. 6. I am back to Moscow. In 2 days later I am going to St. Petersburg International Economic Forum.

Author: E_L
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi all,  Thanks again for supporting us!  It was a very busy 3 days after preICO)) I'm in New York right now and there a lot of people here who I want to meet here at Consensus. (Btw, if you are here - please feel free to contact me and we can meet (PM me in slack))  So, some news:  1. Our acceleration program in Starta Accelerator is finished. There was a demo day at 17, May. The photo are here (TonTon, thanks for sharing) :      It was a very unusual demoday because all visitors were wearing earphones to hear our pitches (Like at "silent disco"'s). I hope we will have a more professional photos and videos, I post them here.   2. Starta Accelerator have announced  their own ICO date. Please, check out it: https://startaico.com They have a very strong team and very good portfolio of projects. I really love this guys and will miss all of them.  3. We've participated at Mobile Venture Summit  at 17, May in Mountain View . There will be a lot of venture investors who’s liked our idea and who wants to talk about venture investments, but we will allow only cryptoinvestments I hope I will take photo from this event, too.  4. We participated in today's Consensus 2017 Hackathon and have created a cool small webservice called EtherSend (It allows you to send ETH to friends using their phone numbers).  I will not develop it later, because I'm all into the Suretly, but guys from iCoinSoft probably will. Anyway, I had a lot of fun, met new people and did some PR activities    Btw, here is Julia's pitch from this hackathon: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rBFhP-DgIzE  5. Here's my plan for next few weeks:   - SG company incorporation & legal consultations   - Recruit more people   - Prepare for a massive PR activity   - Meet with private investors   - Visit several conferences: May, 22-23   Consensus   New York, US May, 24-25   SVOD   Mountain View, US June, 1-3SPIEF   Saint Petersburg, RU June, 7-8           Startup Village   Moscow, RU June, 22           Blockchain & Bitcoin Conference   Saint Petersburg, RU June, 26-28   Money20/20 Europe   Copenhagen July, 11-13   RISE   Hong Kong      If you know more conferences in June related to FinTech or/and Blockchain - please share that information with me!  6. We need to decide about ICO date. I’ve had a lot of consultations with different people and all of them adviced me to move ICO start date to middle of July, because we need more time to prepare. What do you thinks guys? I know, in the first post I told about late June, but it looks like mid July is much better.  7.  We’ve started the channel in Slack, please, join us: suretly.herokuapp.com  So that’s all our news for today!

Author: iCoinSoftware
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Hi Breasal,  In a week Eugene will go straight to Singapore to establish a legal entity and to work at the whole legal structure. From every loan there will be a withholding of 0.2% for a fund to buy tokens back on an exchange at the market's rate every quarter of a year.  As soon as we will work with the whole legal structure everything will be put in the white paper.

Author: iCoinSoftware
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: For now the dashboard will remain as it is.  There are a lot of questions about the exchange rate in the dashboard. The exchange rate on your dashboard is the rate of an actual exchange of your invested cryptocurrency to SUR-tokens. For example, you've invested 7 Waves, an exchange rate is - 1:0.3 (http://dl4.joxi.net/drive/2017/05/19/0001/2413/104813/13/53c61c1f9f.png) According to this rate you will get 2.1 PRESUR. So the exchange rate in your dashboard has nothing to do with EURO or USD.

Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly

Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: The whitepaper states that each SUR token was projected to cost $4.8 USD. Due to the increase in BTC price, the tokens cost today roughly $6.50 USD.  Cant the company better distribute tokens (increase the number) to match the cost quoted in the whitepaper? Currently seems like SUR value is not adjusted well to the BTC price surge and it should.  Also - is there a difference in pre-ICO and ICO? So a total of 50 000 SUR seem to be up for sale in pre-ICO, does this mean another ICO will be held after this round (apart from the employee round)? Whitepaper states "One day prior to the official ICO start, these tokens will be converted into SUR tokens at a 1 to 2 rate", could you better explain the timeline and if when we receive these tokens, they will be doubled?

Author: E_L
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: We are a very early stage company and we have no profit at the time, so our valuation can only be based on the future cash flow. Our previous investment round in February was based on $1.85M valuation (we raised money from professional VC). We have tested a lot of hypotheses and made sure that our business is working.  Now we are looking money for scaling. Basically, the more money we'll raise, the more countries we will be operating next 12-18 months. For example, we need $1.5M for establishing business in 4 countries (including current). If we'll raise $5M - we'll start a business in 15 countries approximately. Our preliminary financial plan is included to whitepaper and we will create a more accurate financial plan after pre-ICO. Also, we will include in whitepaper more information about current legal entities , team, etc, but we should make more legal researching before it. Please keep in mind that ICO is not legal in some countries and some information can be very 'sensitive', so we can't share it with public until we will have a good legal base. So, to prepare for a full ICO we should allocate a good budget for it, that's why we decide to make pre-ICO first. Of course, we already have some offers from professional VCs, but they do not allow us to spent their money to ICO-campaign.  I hope I answered your questions well, but if not - feel free to ask me more.   Next 2-3 weeks I'll be in New York and I'm available for short in-person meetings. Also, anyone can RSVP to our demo day and ask me 'sensitive' (and non-sensitive) questions , here is the link:  https://www.eventbrite.com/e/redefining-demo-day-silent-demo-day-at-noisy-techcrunch-afterparty-in-nyc-tickets-32897165307  Disclaimer: U.S. citizens are not legally allowed to participate in our ICO.

Author: E_L
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: I understand,  that Newbie's project may look suspicious. But I want to assure you that the Suretly project is a real.  First of all, you can read a lot of articles about us in Russian media:  For example, this is the link to one of the biggest Russia's business media: http://money.rbc.ru/news/57bdbc3f9a7947539d803d2a (sorry, it's in russian, but you can use translator)  This is the link to one of the biggest Russia's startup-media: http://www.rb.ru/suretly/ (In Russian)  And this is the link to an international multimedia project about Russia: http://rbth.com/science_and_tech/2017/04/19/tinder-for-microloans-how-to-share-lending-risk-with-strangers_746448 (in English).  Second, we have venture investors from "real market":  One of them is Moscow High School of Economics (Russia's largest economic research institute) (proof link ). Our second investor is Starta Capital fund (proof link ).  Also, as I mention in Whitepaper, we are going to incorporate an entity in Singapore (because this country are pretty friendly to blockchain). This company will have an option to buy shares of our head company in U.S. So, every SUR token will be baked by Singapore company shares.  So, does it enough for you to see, that our project is real?

Author: E_L
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: We divide the borrowers into 7 risk groups from A to G based on credit histories and/or other factors, where 'A' means low risk and 'G' means very high risk. If you do not like the risk, you can vouch only for borrowers from A and B risk groups. But if you want to earn more - you can take more risk and vouch for borrowers from F and G groups.  Also, please keep in mind that in our case all loans issues by licensed lenders only.

Author: fennyllywof-7700
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: yes.  i understand.  but just because someone has an "A" rating does not mean that they won't default on said  loan.  In fact in BTCJam, you found a lot of the A listed borrowers would build up their profile and repay a load of loans on time..  And then they would do an exit scam with huge amounts of BTC after building trust.

Author: E_L
Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: Yes, some kind of borrower's fraud is possible but there are some facts that I have to point to:  1. Suretly is not a direct lender. We are some sort of marketplace that connect 3 parties: lenders (our partners), the borrowers (lender's customers) and vouchers (investors, our customers) 1. Our partners are fiat lenders only. 2. We have no direct communication with borrowers while they pay loans in full on time. The loan applications are fills by the borrowers on the lender's websites. 3. The borrowers are not anonymous - they are identified by the lender. 3. The credit risk group is based on credit history and/or other data not related to our platform. 4. The lender always reports borrower's non-payments to credit history bureau 5. We are focused only for short-term micro-lending, so the maximun loan amount is $1000 (the medium loan amount is $350)  Of course, scammers are very inventive and we will do all the best to avoid the fraud.

Title: ★ SUR ★ Token As A Pledge for Suretly
Body: We do not offer to borrow or to lend any money with coins. Each token will be backed by one share. (See whitepaper for details).  Each token will be backed by one share. Each quarter after the 3rd quarter after the ICO will be completed, we will be transferring 0.2% of each loan secured by Suretly's investors to token compensation fund. This money will be used on exchanges to buyback tokens. The tokens purchased through this process will be evenly distributed as dividends among all remaining token holders.

In its third year, Benzinga has expanded the event’s purview to the global stage, bringing over 200 companies to New York City from countries including India, Israel, Poland, and Singapore. The judging panel includes an “unprecedented” level of fintech talent, such as current and former C-suite executives of financial institutions like Morningstar and Thomson Reuters, as well as many leading investors, VCs, television personalities and financial innovators of all stripes.
